about_the_game:
Add six unique audio effects to your voice with the Special Effects Voice Add-On for MorphVOX Pro.

Sound like you are giving orders over a radio, talking underwater, hiding out in a cave or just confuse your friends with some alien gibberish.

These new voices use the latest in MorphVOX filter technology to give you even more fun things to do with MorphVOX Pro.
detailed_description:
Add six unique audio effects to your voice with the Special Effects Voice Add-On for MorphVOX Pro.

Sound like you are giving orders over a radio, talking underwater, hiding out in a cave or just confuse your friends with some alien gibberish.

These new voices use the latest in MorphVOX filter technology to give you even more fun things to do with MorphVOX Pro.
name: MorphVOX Pro 4 - Special Effects Voices

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy MorphVOX Pro 4 - Special Effects Voices

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Pentium IV 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0
  • Additional Notes: Headset microphone and speaker recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5 or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 8.0
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0
